attributes.action: Give environmental issues the same legislative backing as health and safety issues in business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Health and Safety is now an integral part of the way businesses are run, it is not just an "add on", there are legislative mechanisms in place to ensure this. The environment, in its widest sense, is still treated by many organisations as an "unneccessary evil" or a good PR excercise.
